pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, England | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, England.

The Prime Minister reaffirmed to the Mayor that the UK is among Canada's closest likeminded partners with whom we share deep bilateral commercial relations and strong people-to-people ties, particularly with the city of London.

They further discussed issues of mutual interest, including increasing inclusive trade and investment as well as peaceful pluralism.
